extglob-ending-with-state-char.js

  • opal/stdlib/nodejs/node_modules/glob/node_modules/minimatch/test/extglob-ending-with-state-char.js
  • Last modified: 2015-08-19 01:14:21 +0200

var test = require('tap').test var minimatch = require('../')

test('extglob ending with statechar', function(t) {

t.notOk(minimatch('ax', 'a?(b*)'))
t.ok(minimatch('ax', '?(a*|b)'))
t.end()

})
